title: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
summary: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker[lower-alpha 2] is an action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo for the GameCube home video game console. The tenth installment in The Legend of Zelda series, it was released in Japan in December 2002, in North America in March 2003, and in Europe in May 2003.
